trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您將 easing 函式與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 主要畫面格動畫產生關聯的類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Point> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Windows.Point>沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Windows.Point> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame>間進行插補<xref:System.Windows.Point>先前的主要畫面格和它自己的值，以線性方式與來產生其輸出值加/減速函式的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use key frames with easing functions associated with them to create an animation that simulates an oval going up in the air and falling back down, where it bounces to a stop.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用與其相關聯的 easing 函式中的主要畫面格，來建立模擬上漲空氣中，並回到關機，則退停止的其中一個橢圓動畫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 的初始值。

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始索引鍵時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> 值和關鍵時間，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 的初始值。

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始索引鍵時間。

trans-unit.source: The easing function.
trans-unit.target: easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value, key time, and easing function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame" /> 值、索引鍵時間和 easing 函式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 建立衍生類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: 動畫類別間接繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>建構自訂動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a typical implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範典型實作<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用到主要畫面格的 easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 套用到主要畫面格的 easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *easingFunction*
trans-unit.target: *easingFunction*

trans-unit.source: Exactly one object element for an object that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase> and thus implements <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IEasingFunction>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自物件有一個物件元素<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>並因此實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IEasingFunction>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame.EasingFunction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingPointKeyFrame.EasingFunction" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 要建立動畫的來源值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0.0 和 1.0 (含) 之間的值，指定這個主要畫面格經過的時間百分比。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: 根據所用的 easing 函式，在前一個主要畫面格值與目前主要畫面格值之間使用提供的漸次累加進行插補。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 在指定基底值和漸次累加時，這個主要畫面格的輸出值。
